title: Introduction
description: An open source component collection , that extend your ui library , built using shadcn component
body:
const{Fragment:n,jsx:e,jsxs:o}=arguments[0];function _createMdxContent(t){const l={a:"a",code:"code",figure:"figure",h2:"h2",li:"li",p:"p",pre:"pre",span:"span",strong:"strong",ul:"ul",...t.components};return o(n,{children:[o(l.p,{children:["Welcome to Shadcn-extension-component documentation! This is a guide to help you get started with Shadcn-extension-component. Shadcn-extension-component is an extend for Shadcn/ui component library that provides a set of components for building web applications. It is built on top of ",e(l.a,{href:"https://ui.shadcn.com/",children:"Shadcn/ui"}),"."]}),"
",e(l.h2,{children:"Motivation"}),"
",e(l.p,{children:"Shadcn-extension-component is a set of components that are built on top of Shadcn-ui . It extends the component that are provided by shadcn and use the one there to build some common component for the most web apps . It is built with the following goals in mind:"}),"
",o(l.ul,{children:["
",o(l.li,{children:[e(l.strong,{children:"Customizable"}),": Shadcn-extension-component is designed to be highly customizable. It provides a set of components that can be easily customized to fit your needs."]}),"
",o(l.li,{children:[e(l.strong,{children:"Easy to use"}),": Shadcn-extension-component is designed to be easy to use. It provides a set of components that are easy to use and can be easily integrated into your web application."]}),"
",o(l.li,{children:[e(l.strong,{children:"No need for installation"}),": Shadcn-extension-component does not require any installation. just copy past the code and install the shadcn/ui component that it uses."]}),"
"]}),"
",e(l.h2,{children:"Getting Started"}),"
",o(l.p,{children:["To get started with Shadcn-extension-component, you need to have a basic understanding of ReactJs/NextJs and Tailwinds . You also need to have a basic understanding of Shadcn-ui. If you are new to Shadcn-ui, you can check out the ",e(l.a,{href:"https://ui.shadcn.com/",children:"Shadcn-ui documentation"}),"."]}),"
",e(l.h2,{children:"Installation"}),"
",o(l.p,{children:["To install Shadcn-extension-component, you need to configure the shadcn/ui component that it uses. You can do this by following the instructions in the ",e(l.a,{href:"https://ui.shadcn.com/",children:"Shadcn-ui documentation"}),"."]}),"
",e(l.h2,{children:"Usage"}),"
",o(l.p,{children:["To use Shadcn-extension-component, you need to copy past the components that you want to use from the ",e(l.code,{children:"shadcn-extension-component"})," . You can then use these components in your web application."]}),"
